Name: PKG_CONFIG_PATH
Options: {:name=>"PKG_CONFIG_PATH", :current_path=>nil, :debug=>true, :verbose=>true}

	/root/.config/paths/pkg_config_paths.d
	/root/.config/paths/pkg_config_paths
	/etc/pkg_config_paths.d
	/etc/pkg_config_paths
